con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="HelloWebServiceService" targetNamespace="http://ws.server.ws.training.aha.asseco.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="sayHelloResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:sayHelloResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> name="HelloWebServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:HelloWebService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="sayHello"> <soap:operation <wsdl:definitions name="ProviderAPI" targetNamespace="urn:com:asseco:aha:training:ws:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" name="ProviderResponseExtended"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <jaxws:bindings> <jaxws:enableWrapperStyle>false</jaxws:enableWrapperStyle> </jaxws:bindings> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding location="http://phawhavelkanb2:8080/ws-server-as/WsTrainingProviderService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:com:asseco:aha:training:types:v1" version="0.0.1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns="urn:com:asseco:aha:training:types:v1"> <xs:element name="AddRequest" type="AddRequest"/> <xs:element name="AddResponse" type="AddResponse"/> <xs:element name="ProviderRequest" type="ProviderRequest"/> <xs:element name="ExtendedProviderRequest" type="ExtendedProviderRequest"/> <xs:element name="ProviderResponse" type="ProviderResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="AddRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="number" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AddResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProviderRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExtendedProviderRequest"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ProviderRequest"> <xs:attribute default="false" name="showHeaders" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProviderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
